content:
Begginer issues in rust. pls help if u can
am trying to build a simple command line interface to open a folder, list my files, and then count the number of word occurences in each file. Somehow i was able to write code till opening folders and then counting the total letters count. But actually i want to count the word occurances in each file. i already have a separate code for counting word occurances in a file. am trying to connect both. could u pls help me out in this?

https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=55ce9ee608e04b824ec7c1e1f130e369

https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=7b060334a438f74dd23094a362bc73af

wanna replace the character counter with the word counter. Would be great if u help me asap
if u feel like helping do give a reply here or a DM!
Hi, all. I'm a researcher, focusing on usability of programming languages. I'm working on developing an easy-to-use garbage collector to make writing some kinds of Rust code easier.
Manish Goregaokar is the author :)

Welcome! Nice to see a fellow Maryland-er here :smile:

You might also be interested in https://boats.gitlab.io/blog/post/shifgrethor-i/ which is another attempt at writing a GC library for Rust and has links to some of the other ideas in this area.
Yup, I've looked at both of those. Thanks!
A key difference is that for usability reasons, I want to determine the roots automatically.
Hi all! I'm really excited to join this community. I'm currently working my way through the Rust Book and practicing with the 2020 Advent of Code. ::<>

Hi all! I am Santosh Nagarakatte, a researcher in programming languages/compilers/verification and an associate professor of computer science at Rutgers University. I am excited to know more about the internals of the Rust compiler. We are building profilers and verification tools for various systems languages and are planning to explore Rust in that context.
Hi @Santosh Nagarakatte! Sounds exciting! Have you seen the rustc dev guide and the #t-compiler and #t-compiler/help streams?
